pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:0.5: 41. The training rule on royal houses
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.2: artwork had been installed in the pleasure house in King Pasenadi of Kosala’s park.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.3: Many people visited the pleasure house,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.4: as did the nuns from the group of six.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.6: “How can nuns visit a pleasure house? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.7: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.8: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.9: “How could the nuns from the group of six do this?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.10: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.13: “How could the nuns from the group of six do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.15: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.16.1: ‘If a nun visits a royal house or a pleasure house or a park or a garden or a lotus pond, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.15: If she is on her way to visit them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.16: Wherever she stands to see them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.17: Every time she goes beyond the range of sight and then sees them again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.18: If she is on her way to visit any one of them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.19: Wherever she stands to see it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.20: Every time she goes beyond the range of sight and then sees it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
